subject: RE: [junit] Periods in responses
msgSnippet: ... newer versions of junit do not display the equal parts of the strings to help you find the difference in (large) strings.
messageBody:
> 1) testCreateInstance
> (com.cpe205.ThinkTank.Executor.JUnit_CIMOMAdapter)
> junit.framework.ComparisonFailure: expected:<CIM_ERRO...> but
> was:<Error executing 'createInstance': CIM_ER...>
>
> I realize that the two strings I am comparing are different, but
> what is the "..."?

newer versions of junit do not display the equal parts of the strings
to help you find the difference in (large) strings.

http://sourceforge.net/tracker/index.php?func=detail&aid=609972&group_id=152
78&atid=115278
http://sourceforge.net/tracker/index.php?func=detail&aid=628712&group_id=152
78&atid=115278

Bernd

> Thanks,
> Shane
